jeers.heavy_jeers06: Which one of you is crying?
jeers.heavy_jeers07: Daaaagh, too many little men on this team!
jeers.heavy_jeers08: Tell me, where did we go so wrong?

autodejectedtie.heavy_autodejectedtie01: We lose, but they do not win?

dominated.scout_misc07: You're like a car crash in slow motion. It's like I'm watchin' ya fly through a windshield.

dominatedmelee.scout_misc04: Man, your skull's so soft you're makin' this easy!
dominatedmelee.scout_misc05: Pop quiz: How long's it take to beat a moron to death? (buzzer imitation) Sorry, time's up, you're dead.

scout.scout_domination05: Hey, knucklehead, you ain't gonna win.
scout.scout_domination07: Ha ha! Look at you! You look like you ran through traffic!
scout.scout_domination13: Hit the bricks, pal. You're done.
scout.scout_domination19: Yeah, I dare ya, rage quit. C'mon, make us both happy!
scout.scout_domination20: Oh, what, you gonna cry? You gonna cry now?
scout.scout_domination21: I will never... Stop... Killing you.
scout.scout_dominationsct02: This map ain't big enough for the two of us.
scout.scout_dominationsct03: Hit the road, bozo! Let a real Scout get to work!

soldier.scout_dominationsol01: Yo, I'm not even wearin' a helmet!
soldier.scout_dominationsol02: What is your major malfunction, brother?
soldier.scout_dominationsol04: You're a disgrace to the uniform, pal!
soldier.scout_dominationsol06: There ain't enough crits in the world to kill me!

pyro.scout_domination06: It's startin' to bore me how much you suck.
pyro.scout_dominationpyr02: Yo, if you didn't want me to kill ya, ya shoulda said somethin'!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr03: Repeat after me: mhmm-mhmm-mhmm I'm dead!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr04: Take that, ya dumb, bib-wearin' dope!
pyro.scout_dominationpyr05: Eat it, ya mute, frickin' moron!
pyro.scout_misc08: Dude, you'd get a closed casket at the ugly cemetery.

demoman.scout_domination01: You just got freakin' dominated, knucklehead, all right, let's do this!
demoman.scout_domination10: I don't usually kill morons this fast.
demoman.scout_dominationdem01: Yeah, next time, try two eyes!
demoman.scout_dominationdem03: The best man won, ya bomb-throwin' drunk!
demoman.scout_dominationdem04: Your clock just got cleaned, rummy!
demoman.scout_dominationdem05: Depth perception, pal. Look into it.

heavy.scout_domination08: Drink it in, pal. That's how failure tastes.
heavy.scout_domination09: Would you look at you? I mean, look at you.
heavy.scout_dominationhvy01: I am owning you, you fat, bald bastard!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy03: $400,000 to fire that gun, huh? Yeah, money well spent!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy04: Them $200 bullets ain't so hot when they don't hit nuthin', are they?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy05: I think I'll take Sasha out for a steak dinner tonight. Whataya think about that?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy06: Ain't so hard now, are ya, fatcakes?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy07: I... Eat... Your... Sandwiches. I eat 'em up!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy08: Nice hustle, 'tons-a-fun'! Next time, eat a salad!
heavy.scout_dominationhvy09: Hey, lard-fat, those hard arteries don't stop bullets, do they?
heavy.scout_dominationhvy10: I am owning you, you fat, bald, fatty fat... fat fat!

engineer.scout_domination17: Is that all you got, moron?
engineer.scout_dominationeng01: Hey, here's somethin' you can invent next time: duckin'!
engineer.scout_dominationeng02: Here's something you shoulda built: a not-dyin' machine!
engineer.scout_dominationeng03: Don't bring a wrench to a gunfight!
engineer.scout_dominationeng04: Here's a schematic for ya: my ass!
engineer.scout_dominationeng06: Lotta good that hardhat did ya!

medic.scout_misc02: If you order now, I'll throw in a second beatin', absolutely free.
medic.scout_dominationmed02: Ooh hoo hoo, your gun shoots medicine! It's intimidatin'!

sniper.scout_domination12: Look at this: just caved in your skull, my bat's still dry. No clumps of hair - nothin'.
sniper.scout_dominationsnp02: That fancy scope of yours, betcha got a real good view of me killin' ya!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp03: You camped the whole time for this?!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp04: It was a mercy killin', ya live in a... Campervan!
sniper.scout_dominationsnp05: You'll never hit me! You'll never hit my tiny head! It's so tiny, I got a frickin'... Such a tiny li'l head!

spy.scout_award10: I'll put it in my trophy room, with the othas.
spy.scout_dominationspy03: Hard to stab a guy in the back when he's beatin' your frickin' head in, huh?
spy.scout_dominationspy04: Hehey, look, you shapeshifted into a dead guy!

revenge.scout_revenge02: How do ya like me now, blockhead?
revenge.scout_revenge06: Don't you ever cross me again!
revenge.scout_revenge07: What have we learned? I always win!
revenge.scout_revenge08: Who's the tough guy now, huh, tough guy?

meleedare.scout_misc03: I'm gonna beat on your skull 'till I hit tonsils.
meleedare.scout_taunts05: I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha'!
meleedare.scout_taunts06: Yeah, come get some, you frickin' wuss!

sentryahead.scout_sentryahead03: They got a Sentry up there!

spy.scout_cloakedspy01: Yeah, there's a Spy over there!
spy.scout_cloakedspyidentify08: That freakin' Hard Hat's a Spy!
spy.scout_cloakedspyidentify06: That Spy ain't one of us!

jeers.scout_jeers08: What the hell is you guys' problem?
jeers.scout_jeers11: What the hell was that crap?
jeers.scout_jeers12: This is a real frickin' embarrassment!

negativevocalization.scout_negativevocalization05: 'Kay, this does not look good here.. um..

autodejectedtie.scout_autodejectedtie01: You have got to be kidding!

autocappedcontrolpoint.scout_autocappedcontrolpoint03: I got it, I got it!

autocappedintelligence.scout_autocappedintelligence03: I got it, I got it, I got it!
autocappedintelligence.scout_specialcompleted05: Wave goodbye to your secret crap, dumbass!

fightoncap.scout_fightoncap01: Hey, get on the cap, guys!
fightoncap.scout_fightoncap03: Let's get on the cap, fellas!
fightoncap.scout_fightoncap04: Get on the cap, ya dopes!

helpmecapture.scout_helpmecapture02: I'm cappin' over here, who's with me?
helpmecapture.scout_helpmecapture03: Am I gonna hafta capture this thing by myself?
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint01: Stand on the freakin' point, you moron!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint02: What the hell is wrong with you? Stand on the freakin' point!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint03: Get on the freakin' point dumbass!
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint04: Would you kindly move ya ass to the freakin' point?
helpmecapture.scout_standonthepoint05: How's the weather over there, dumbass? Get to the freakin' point!

helpmedefend.scout_helpmedefend01: Get over here and help me defend!
helpmedefend.scout_helpmedefend03: What? Am I gonna hafta defend this thing by myself?

goodjob.scout_goodjob04: Alright, yeah, that's- naw, that's a pretty good job.

go.scout_go01: Let's go, let's go, let's go!

moveup.scout_moveup01: Move it up, move it up!

headright.scout_headright02: Yeah, let's go to the right!

awards.scout_award01: Hey, look at me, look at me!
awards.scout_award07: No otha' class gonna do dat!
awards.scout_award10: I'll put it in my trophy room, with the othas.
awards.scout_award11: I don't know who to thank first... Oh, I know, me!
awards.scout_award12: Bang! I make it look easy.

specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted06: Yo, I oughta' be on a baseball card!
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted09: 'Ey, is somebody keepin' track of my heads batted in?
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted10: I broke your stupid crap, moron!
specialcompleted.scout_specialcompleted12: Ya got anything smart ta say now?

taunts.scout_taunts03: Yeah, why don't you come over and say that to my face, tough guy?
taunts.scout_taunts04: Not so tough now, are ya? Are ya?!
taunts.scout_taunts05: I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha'!
taunts.scout_taunts06: Yeah, come get some, you frickin' wuss!
taunts.scout_taunts08: Say goodbye to ya kneecaps, chucklehead!
taunts.scout_taunts09: Hey, lotta' good that gun didya!
taunts.scout_taunts11: Ya head's a freakin' bat magnet!
taunts.scout_taunts12: Hey, knucklehead, I'm talking ta you!
taunts.scout_taunts16: You knuckleheads ain't even worth the effort.
taunts.scout_taunts17: You morons are about to catch a real beatin'.
taunts.scout_misc03: I'm gonna beat on your skull 'till I hit tonsils.

apexofjump.scout_apexofjump03: Look at you chuckleheads down there!
apexofjump.scout_apexofjump04: Hey, I can see my base from here!

invincible.scout_invincible02: Ya can't hit what ain't dere!

stunballhit.scout_stunballhit01: Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hit ya... No, wait, yeah, I did.
stunballhit.scout_stunballhit02: Oh, dat's a skull fracture for sure!
stunballhit.scout_stunballhit03: Ohh, I got alla dat one.

offense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackoffense01: Dat ain't da right way, guys!
offense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackoffense04: Is someone gonna push da freakin' cart?

offense/stayclose.scout_cartstaycloseoffense05: We pushin' this thing or what?

offense/stopped.scout_cartstoppedoffense02: What da hell, who stopped pushin' the cart?!
offense/stopped.scout_cartstoppedoffense03: Push it, push it, push it!

defense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackdefense03: Hey now we're doin' it, now we're doin' it!
defense/goingback.scout_cartgoingbackdefense06: Yo, it should be goin' dat way!

defense/goingforward.scout_cartmovingforwarddefense02: Aw, jeez guys, we gotta stop it!
defense/goingforward.scout_cartmovingforwarddefense03: What the hell is everyone doin'?!

scout.soldier_dominationscout02: How's that domination feel, city boy?
scout.soldier_dominationscout03: You kids today don't know how to dominate.
scout.soldier_dominationscout05: You cannot run from me, my gun is faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout06: You run fast, my bullets run faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout07: Never bring a bat to a battlefield, war is not a game.
scout.soldier_dominationscout08: Your mouth wrote checks, my gun has cashed them.
scout.soldier_dominationscout09: Got anything funny to say about that, funny man?
scout.soldier_dominationscout10: Never send a boy to fight a man's war.
scout.soldier_dominationscout11: You were in a big fat hurry to die, son.

soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier02: You better hope there's hacky-sack in Hell, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier03: You are now a conscientious objector to being dead, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier04: What's the matter, hippie? Hair get in your eyes?
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier06: You're a disgrace to the uniform.

pyro.soldier_dominationpyro01: I just tore you a new chimney, Smokey Joe!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro02: You cannot burn me, I'm already on fire!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro03: You cannot burn me! I'm already ablaze with passion, for war!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro04: You cannot burn me! I do not have time to combust!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro05: Fire is for cookin' s'mores, son. Get a real gun.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro06: Your fire-retardant ass just got dominated.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro07: Ha! Ya fight like a girl!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro08: How do you like that, All Quiet on the Western Front?
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro09: Get a haircut, hippie! [whispered] Just in case.

demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman02: Consider yourself dominated, you Scotch son of a bitch!
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman04: I love your death, cyclops; your death is sweet to me like love is sweet.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman05: Scotland is not a real country; you are an Englishman with a dress.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman06: You're like the Cyclops of Greek myth; except you are Scottish, and I hate you!

heavy.soldier_dominationheavy02: Stars and Stripes beats Hammer and Sickle. Look it up!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy05: Go play your pinko chess game with the Devil, Commie!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy06: This American boot just kicked your ass back to Russia!

engineer.soldier_dominationengineer03: Stop hiding behind your little toys and fight like a man!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer04: I will eat your ribs, I will eat them up!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer05: That's where books get you, professor!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer06: Go back to Calgary, ya cow-herdin' Canadian!

medic.soldier_dominationmedic04: Ich bin I just kicked your ass!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic05: Welcome to the United States of YOU JUST GOT DOMINATED!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic06: I'm gonna mail my boot to the Kaiser with your ass around it!

sniper.soldier_dominationsniper01: This is not a camping trip, Sheila; this is war and I love it!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper02: You will not turn my battlefield into a campground.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper03: Now hear this, camper, you are not wanted on my beloved battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper04: I will send my condolences to your kangaroo wife.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper05: You are a coward, and you died like one.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper06: The next time you want to kill a man, look him in the eyes!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper07: You just got dominated, Bilbo Baggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper08: You just got dominated, Balbo Biggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper09: You just got dominated, Bablo Bravins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper10: You just got dominated, Barble Bapkins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper11: You just got dominated, Bazbo Bibbons!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper12: Aww, am I too violent for you, cupcake?
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper13: Your country did not prepare you for the level of violence you will meet on my battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper14: You just got dominated, Bulbo Buttons!

spy.soldier_dominationspy02: You just got your Frenchie ass dominated.
spy.soldier_dominationspy06: Your white flag does not stop American bullets.
spy.soldier_dominationspy07: Words cannot express how much I hate France right now!

battlecry.soldier_battlecry04: Last one alive, lock the door!

spy.soldier_cloakedspyidentify09: That Spy is not one of ours!

jeers.soldier_jeers02: Each and every one of you has failed.
jeers.soldier_jeers03: Are you all trying for a Section 8?
jeers.soldier_jeers04: Which of you numbnuts let us down?
jeers.soldier_jeers05: You have dishonored this entire unit.
jeers.soldier_jeers06: You are the sorriest excuses for soldiers I have ever seen!
jeers.soldier_jeers07: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
jeers.soldier_jeers10: If I have to crack some skulls, I will.
jeers.soldier_jeers11: That was an amazing killing spree... by the other team!

autodejectedtie.soldier_autodejectedtie02: I will not tolerate failure on my team.

autocappedcontrolpoint.soldier_autocappedcontrolpoint01: Now that is what I wanna see!
autocappedcontrolpoint.soldier_autocappedcontrolpoint02: This point is mine! Do you understand that?

autocappedintelligence.soldier_autocappedintelligence02: And that is how you do it, men!

helpmecapture.soldier_helpmecapture01: You will help me capture my point!
helpmecapture.soldier_helpmecapture02: Rally round, help me cap this point!

helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend01: We need to defend this point!
helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend03: You will help me defend my point!
helpmedefend.soldier_helpmedefend04: This is my point and you will help me defend my point!

cheers.soldier_cheers03: Everyone of you deserves a medal!

moveup.soldier_moveup03: Move up, move up, move up!

hatoverhearttaunt.soldier_hatoverhearttaunt03: You were loud and ugly, and now you're DEAD! Amen.
hatoverhearttaunt.soldier_hatoverhearttaunt06: You were good son, real good; maybe even the best.

taunts.soldier_taunts02: Time to inform your next of kin!
taunts.soldier_taunts03: If you know what's good for ya, you will run!
taunts.soldier_taunts04: You are scum! You are nothin' but a buncha' cowards!
taunts.soldier_taunts05: I am going to enjoy killing each and every one of you sorry sacks of scum!
taunts.soldier_taunts06: You sissified maggot scum have just signed your death warrants!
taunts.soldier_taunts07: If God had wanted you to live, He would not have created me!
taunts.soldier_taunts08: I am going to claw my way down your throat and tear out your very soul!
taunts.soldier_taunts09: Take your lumps like a man, Private Twinkletoes.
taunts.soldier_taunts10: You are all weak! You are all bleeders!
taunts.soldier_taunts11: Each and every one of you will be sent home to your momma' in a box!
taunts.soldier_taunts12: We have you surrounded, at least from this side!
taunts.soldier_taunts13: I joined this team just to kill maggots like you.
taunts.soldier_taunts14: Do not look at me, I did not ask you a question!
taunts.soldier_taunts15: Surrender now, maggots, and you will not be harmed!
taunts.soldier_taunts16: The last word out of your sorry mouth will be Sir, and it will be loud!
taunts.soldier_taunts17: This is my world. You are not welcome in my world.
taunts.soldier_taunts18: You are a spineless worm! You are a mistake of nature! You are walking vomit!
taunts.soldier_taunts19: You are a maggot hatched from a mutant maggot egg!
taunts.soldier_taunts20: I am going to strangle you with your own frilly training bra!
taunts.soldier_taunts21: You are all maggots, you scum sucking fruit baskets!

offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense01: Do not let that cart roll back!
offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense02: The cart needs to go forward!

offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense03: I do not see enough pushing!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense10: Ladies, let's get this cart moving!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense11: You will push this cart or I will push you into a grave!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense12: We will push until there is nothing left to push!

offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense05: Stick to that cart like glue, that is an order!
offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense06: Get to the cart! Hup, hup, hup!

offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense01: Why is that cart stopped, maggots?!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense02: I do not see a cart moving, ladies!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense03: Why is that cart not moving?!

defense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackdefense02: That's it, men, move that cart back!

defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense01: Do not let that cart go forward!
defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense02: Hold the line, men! Stop that cart!

defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense01: Stand next to the cart, damn you!
defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense03: You will stand next to that cart or I will stand you next to that cart!
